channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 41D10
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 5, 03:00 - 04:00 UTC

Nov 25, 08:13 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been postponed.
The new schedule for this maintenance is as follows

Start time : 05/12/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 05/12/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance time.

Nov 19, 14:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect Availability.

Start time : 27/11/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 27/11/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance time.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T02A76 T02A75
item.description:
Nov 25, 17:02 UTC

End time : 25/11/2024 16:55 UTC

We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 25, 16:44 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 25/11/2024 16:32 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack T02A75 and T02A76 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - Degradation in the performance of order servers
item.description:
Nov 20, 15:17 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/11/2024 22:09 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 01:25 UTC

We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 20, 01:45 UTC
Monitoring - We are pleased to inform you that the issue impacting your service has been resolved since 20/11/2024 01:25 UTC.
Thank you for your patience as our technical teams worked to find a solution.
We will continue to monitor the situation to ensure that everything stays running smoothly.

We will provide an update as soon as we have made sufficient progress.

We will provide an update as soon as we have made progress.

Start time : 19/11/2024 22:09 UTC

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
